sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; export const ItemCard = ({toggleEditing, item, image,}) => (
{item.isEditing ?
:

{item.name}

Price ${item.price}

}
); ItemCard.propTypes = { image: PropTypes.string.isRequired, item: PropTypes.shape({ name: PropTypes.string.isRequired, price: PropTypes.string.isRequired }), toggleEditing: PropTypes.func.isRequired, };
